label: specifiedTradeSettlementHeaderMonetarySummation
comment: The monetary summation totals specified for this header trade settlement.

rangeIncludes.comment: A collection of monetary amount totals, specified at header level, for a trade settlement.

domainIncludes.comment: The information, at a header level, that enables the reconciliation of a financial transaction, with the item(s) that the financial transaction is intended to settle, such as a commercial invoice.
